name: kdux-flipper-plugin
description: Plugin to help debugging and monitoring kdux enabled applications
author: Jonathan Glanz

scripts.build: cd kdux-flipper-plugin && mkdir -p dist/kdux-flipper-plugin && babel src/main/javascript -d dist/kdux-flipper-plugin && cp ../package.json dist/kdux-flipper-plugin/package.json
scripts.dev: npm run build && cd kdux-flipper-plugin && babel -w -d dist/kdux-flipper-plugin src/main/javascript
